Content Creation Proposal

We want to help transform your social media presence.

We've got a vision.


We want to help you showcase your brand as the most modern, fresh supermarket and the best choice for premium and imported food. We'll help you reflect the incredible products you offer through your content and social media, and attract the right target audience.

WHO WE ARE

Karen Gudmunds is a content creator, digital marketer, and web developer from Iceland that has helped many businesses attract their ideal client, and boost sales through their websites, social media and digital marketing. She helps brands capture the essence of their personality and really tell a story through photography & videography.

Danielle Muntain is a content creator, digital marketer and influencer from Canada currently living in Los Angeles. With a background in fashion marketing, traveling the world and showcasing her message to encourage others to chase their dreams, is her greatest passion.

Together, we have worked with businesses all over the world, and are eger to help your business grow their online presence.

Our Pitch

We offer full-service content creation and social media management to help you build a strong digital and social media presence for each of your brand.

  • Content Creation & Instagram Grid
    $1400 per month
  • Social Media Scheduling
    + $1250 per month
  • Rates are monthly, and per brand.

Content Creation

Each month we will capture professional photos and short videos to provide enough content for you to fill your social media and website, and reflect the premier quality and variety of the your brand. This package includes full planning and co-ordination of each shoot, the photography itself and professional editing to suit your aesthetic.

  • 1x photoshoot per month with photography assistant
  • Up to 30 high resolution edited photos (enough for 1 month worth of content)
  • Putting together a curated instagram grid aesthetic, using the content provided.

Social Media Scheduling

Each month we would take the content we have shot and schedule it all for you in an instagram management tool (we recommend Later) creating a beautiful cohesive grid, and scheduling the posts at times where your audience is highly engaged. Then we would write engaging captions (in perfect english!), and add relevant hashtags and location tags.

We'll take into account current promotions, marketing strategies and featured products as well as the overall goals of each brand.

  • 30 posts per month scheduled to both Facebook & Instagram
  • Writing engaging captions
  • Relevant hashtags & location tags
  • Scheduled for automatic posting at key times
